item.title: Improving your life with pre-commit
item.description: What is pre-commit and how can it help me? If you’re not aware of pre-commit, it’s one of a variety of tools that you can use to run a series of tests and checks on your code at the point of committing to git. From the pre-commit site: [pre-commit] is a multi-language package manager for pre-commit hooks. You specify a list of hooks you want and pre-commit manages the installation and execution of any hook written in any language before every commit
